thread.title: Nice hotell near Times Square -
thread.title_full: Nice hotell near Times Square - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Liinu R
title: Nice hotell near Times Square -
text:
I stayed at the Paramount for two nights. The room was cozy, clean and had a bath tub!
The location is excellent if you want to be in the heart of the theatre district and have walking distance to some major New York attractions! But beware: Once you step outside there's a lot of people everywhere!
